healthiest.title: Grilled Salmon
healthiest.summary: High in omega-3 fatty acids and protein. Excellent for muscle recovery and growth while being naturally low in sodium.

health_prediction.short_term: Provides clean, lean protein for immediate muscle repair with minimal water retention due to low sodium.
health_prediction.long_term: Supports consistent muscle gain while maintaining heart health through regular omega-3 intake.

balanced.title: Herb-Roasted Chicken
balanced.summary: Good source of protein with moderate fat content. The wild rice provides complex carbs for sustained energy.

health_prediction.short_term: Complete meal providing balanced energy and satiety for approximately 4-5 hours.
health_prediction.long_term: Reasonable protein support for muscle maintenance while offering diverse nutrient intake.

indulgent.title: House Burger
indulgent.summary: High protein from beef but also high in sodium from bacon and cheese. Request sauce on the side to reduce sodium intake.

health_prediction.short_term: Delivers ample protein for muscle-building but may cause temporary water retention due to sodium content.
health_prediction.long_term: Can support muscle gains when balanced with lower-sodium options in other meals.
